channel.title: Post the best runescape screen recorders HERE!
channel.description:
hey ive tried using hypercam but it lagged so much i cudnt do anything on rs so cud u guys post some screen recorders that dont lag very much pls and ty ^^
EDIT: None that u need to pay for or that u only get a trial ty
